name: Bane of Expedition
description:
Take on the role of an adventurer in a short game about upgrading your weapon!  

Please set your display to 1920x1080 (1080p) resolution, at most, for the game to appear correctly.

This game was created by myself and three others for a capstone level project.  

Programmers - Brady Olson, Jordan Apfelbeck

Art - Lauren McLaughlin (backgrounds, key items, UI), Cameron Quimby (character design)
